title: I Want You to Rely On Me
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>Phew, the morning air is refreshing as always. Oh, that backside is.... Hanayo!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>H-, huh, Umi-chan? Good morning, you’re early.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Yes, I thought I’d stop by the archery range to string my bow. What about you, Hanayo? What are you doing this early?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Eh? Uhh, umm.... It’s.... nothing in particular?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Geez, there’s no way it’s nothing, not when you’re walking around looking worried like that. I don’t know if I can be of help, but you can talk to me.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>....I was the only one that couldn’t do the dance we all did together yesterday well, so I thought I’d practice in the morning....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>....Hanayo.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>I-, I’m sorry! I’ll do my best to get it right before our club today, so-<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Geez, it’s not that. If you’re worried about it, then you should’ve talked to me sooner. I’ll accompany you on your morning practice.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Eh? But don’t you have to go to the archery range, Umi-chan....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Fufu, there’s nothing more important than you, Hanayo. Come on, let’s go!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
